name: 5 Stars: Puzzle of Universe Creation
description:
5 Stars - is original puzzle game developed by the company delivering latest games from Tetris creator - Alexey Pajitnov.

Score points by arranging puzzle pieces in combos and make stars and galaxies.
Build your very own puzzle Universe to win the game.

Walk along the growing puzzle difficulty to widen power horizons of your mind.

Please check 5 Stars game play video here:
http://youtu.be/RMPoifvLAuc
